Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!
